q_en: I am an Advanced Sewer. Please transfer all cutting tasks that started between May 1, 2024, and May 30, 2024, to Premier Sewers.
hint: The ID of Advanced Sewers is 8, and the ID of Premier Sewers is 9. Update the database according to the time requirements described

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM working_group WHERE name = 'Advanced Sewers';
steps.description: Retrieve the working group ID for "Advanced Sewers"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM working_group WHERE name = 'Premier Sewers';
steps.description: Retrieve the working group ID for "Premier Sewers"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM cutting_tasks WHERE working_group_id = '8' AND start_time BETWEEN '2024-05-01' AND '2024-05-30';
steps.description: Retrieve all cutting tasks that started between May 1, 2024, and May 30, 2024, and are currently assigned to "Advanced Sewers"

steps.sql: UPDATE cutting_tasks SET working_group_id = '9' WHERE id IN ();
steps.description: Update the working group ID for the retrieved cutting tasks to "Premier Sewers"
steps.results: (1064, "You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near ')' at line 1")
